place.name: CHILDERDITCH
place.gazetteerText: CHILDERDITCH, a parish in Billericay district, Essex; 2½ miles S by E of Brentwood r. station, and 6 SW of Billericay. Post town, Brentwood. Acres, , 614. Real property, £, 664. Pop., 239. Houses, 43. The property is divided among a few. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Rochester. Value, £160.* Patron, Lord Petre. The church Was reported in 1859 to need repair. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
